title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (with proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling, RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; multi-user, model manager, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Terminal copilot powered by Ollama; explains cmds, generates shell scripts on the fly.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that turns Ollama into a Copilot-style code-completion assistant.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim Lua plugin for inline code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight agent framework using Ollama for tool-use loops (weather, search, shell).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to run Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring-Starter; chat, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, model management; includes Blazor sample.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama LLMs into channels via mentions or slash cmd.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-cuda
summary: Official container images with CUDA support for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated Modelfile collection for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc.
